price: Firgitar nan mafi girma, bã zã ta baƙantã musu rai ba. Kuma malã'iku na yi musu marãba (sunã cẽwa) "Wannan yininku nẽ wanda kuka kasance anã yi muku wa'adi da shi."
arabic: لَا يَحۡزُنُهُمُ ٱلۡفَزَعُ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرُ وَتَتَلَقَّىٰهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ هَٰذَا يَوۡمُكُمُ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُمۡ تُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yaḥzunuhumu al-fazaʿu al-akbaru watatalaqqāhumu al-malāikatu hādhā yawmukumu alladhī kuntum tūʿadūna
